title: DirectX 9 Error:  Error in Direct3D9_CreateDevice: Invalid Call
body:
Hello my Lag of Legends community, It's been a terribly long time. But alas, I would like to pick up the game again, and unfortunately I come to the following error:

000024.002| ALWAYS| Exiting WinMain
> 

**Way's I have already approached the issue**
* Driver Update
* Driver Reinstallation
* DirectX 11 Reinstallation (CURRENTLY PERFORMING DX9 Reinstallation)
* Reboot
* Run as Administrator
* Run as Administrator in Windows 7/8 Compatability Mode

If anyone has any useful information for me to try and remedy this error, I would love to get back on and just lose a few matches like a winner. {{champion:25}}

replies.body:
We used to have a pretty quick and easy fix for these types of issues, but it doesn't seem like it's been working like it used to. There's something going pretty wrong there with your DirectX files, so the best fix is going to be a clean uninstall of those drivers and a reinstall with admin rights. 

We don't seem to have our own guide on this just yet, but I was able to find [**this handy little guide**](https://help.ea.com/en-us/help/pc/how-to-perform-a-clean-installation-of-your-graphics-driver/)!

After another attempt with all the steps, I have this error (idk if it's the same.)

Hmmmm well snap, yea it looks like it's about the same error actually. Let's try a little bit of a different approach for this, let's try making sure your permissions are all set up correctly as well. Check out this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) if you need some steps on how to do so.

If that doesn't seem to be helping at all either, feel free to hit up our tech agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to dig through some of your log files to see what else might be going wrong.

Thank you for your support thus far, and it seems I have found a solution to the problem. 

I decided to do some research on DirectX first and basically ended up running in circles with my attempts using slightly varied methods to no avail, which I honestly expected, but had to try due to technology sensitivity to process. 

I wound up on YouTube hunting around, and I discovered [this video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5F0sGm4KENw), containing the problem and fix to it which I thought was pretty neat.

I am going to share his fix (without the AdFly nonsense, so maybe it can be used and looked at for what major differences there might be)

So far this has fixed my ability to do a custom game, and I am about to test drive it for a bot match, the next closest thing I can do without risking being reported too much.

This is the [MEDIAFIRE LINK TO THE FIX](http://www.mediafire.com/file/wyic3b5rm69dios/game.cfg) for anyone experiencing the same trouble as I am, as well as for RIOT staff/members to have a look at what changes were made to the Game.CFG file. 

I hope this comes to serve RIOT and it's players well.

> [{quoted}](name=JustNotGoodAtAll,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pQi57GB6,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2017-09-29T21:03:59.606+0000)
>

> I am going to share his fix (without the AdFly nonsense, so maybe it can be used and looked at for what major differences there might be)

> 
> This is the [MEDIAFIRE LINK TO THE FIX](http://www.mediafire.com/file/wyic3b5rm69dios/game.cfg) for anyone experiencing the same trouble as I am, as well as for RIOT staff/members to have a look at what changes were made to the Game.CFG file. 
> 
> I hope this comes to serve RIOT and it's players well.


What I discovered using this fix:

1. You cannot use full screen mode, you must use Windowed Mode
2. There are minor lag jumps not associated with ping with this fix
3. Game is still playable on all levels

Hope this helps further!

Thank you for the link, I have tried this, and have reinstalled the league client twice. I am going to try once more though, JUST IN CASE I just so happens to suck at stuff. 

I have also attempted reinstalling DirectX 9 and 11.
